mapper.select: SELECT AUTHOR_CODE , AUTHOR_NM , AUTHOR_DC , AUTHOR_CREAT_DE ,(SELECT COUNT(B.AUTHOR_CODE) FROM LETTNMENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.AUTHOR_CODE = A.AUTHOR_CODE ) AS chk_Yeo_Bu FROM LETTNAUTHORINFO A WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE like '%' || '${searchKeyword}' || '%' LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(AUTHOR_CODE) AS totcnt FROM LETTNAUTHORINFO WHERE AUTHOR_CODE like '%' || '${searchKeyword}' || '%'

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO AS upper_Menu_Id , (SELECT count(B.MENU_NO) FROM LETTNMENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO AND B.AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode}) AS chk_Yeo_Bu FROM LETTNMENUINFO A WHERE A.MENU_NO > 0 ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR
select AUTHOR_CODE from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS where SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = (select ESNTL_ID from COMVNUSERMASTER where user_id = '${searchKeyword}' )
select count(AUTHOR_CODE) from LETTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS where SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = (select ESNTL_ID from COMVNUSERMASTER where user_id = '${searchKeyword}' )
